oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Billy "Crash" Craddock interview - Joe Suglia - 1977-07-30 - WBUK
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Billy "Crash" Craddock, conducted by Joe Suglia from July 30, 1977 on radio station WBUK.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Billy "Crash" Craddock introduction for Joe Suglia's radio program on WBUK -- Billy Craddock introduction for Joe Suglia's radio program on WBUK -- Joe Suglia introduces Craddock -- Craddock talks about his fan club -- Craddock talks about his record You Rubbed It In All Wrong's success -- Craddock talks about not having time to do all his hits at his shows -- Craddock talks about singing ballads -- Craddock talks about his record When The Tear Fell -- Craddock talks about being partial to singing ballads -- Craddock talks about hoping to get his own television show -- Joe Suglia concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Craddock, Billy;
